name: World of Soccer
overview: World of Soccer is a Sports game, developed and published by Challenge Software, which was released in Europe in 1992, it was released in the Championship Challenge compilation. Enter the world of International League & Cup football with this superb strategy game. Your career in World of Soccer may take you to many different clubs all over the world in your challenge to reach the top n International Club Football. 5 Skill levels, 15 of the world's premier leagues. Featuring 240 clubs and over 2600 players.
